pkgmetadata.longdescription: Summary Tables for Statistical Models: Beautiful, Customizable, and Publication-Ready // Create beautiful and customizable tables to summarize several statistical models side-by-side. This package supports dozens of model types and can produce tables in HTML, LaTeX, Markdown, Word, PowerPoint, Excel, RTF, JPG, or PNG. Tables can easily be embedded in 'Rmarkdown' or 'knitr' dynamic documents.
